title: Created frontend merchant hooks to more easily allow for what content is shown
highlights: Rolled out a new generic 'merchant hook' feature that allows merchants to have Nobi's frontend call custom JavaScript functions to determine what content to show. See more at https://docs.nobi.ai/customizing-nobi/hooks/
Added support for the first hook, which will allow merchants to control the 'shopper message' shown to shoppers for a particular product when search results are shown.
